subject: Hockey, Ice
Demonstrations, Protests, and Riots
lead_paragraph: The Vancouver police recommend that 60 people be charged with 163 counts, including assault and breaking and entering, in the riot in downtown after the Canucks lost Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals .
snippet: The Vancouver police recommend that 60 people be charged with 163 counts, including assault and breaking and entering, in the riot in downtown after the Canucks lost Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals .
